snippet.title: Multiple scene display    单机 模拟多人协同作战
snippet.description:
STAR - M is not only a stand-alone third-person game, but also features the simulation of multiplayer cooperative combat. You can play a large-scale multiplayer cooperative combat game without the need for an internet connection. At the same time, you can use the 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 shortcut keys to switch roles at will. The tight combat rhythm, intense plot, high-quality and gorgeous scenes create a refreshing and pleasing gaming experience!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2910140/_/

STAR - M 不仅仅是单机第三人称游戏，更有模拟多人协同作战的特色，在不需要联网的情况下，玩多人协同作战的大场景游戏，同时在多人协同作战的场景中可以用1、2、3、4、5快捷键，随意切换扮演角色，作战节奏紧凑、情节激烈、高品质华丽场景等内容，营造出爽心悦目的游戏体验！
